text:
@WhiteHouse @POTUS There's lots of variables but multiply America's 4.3% pop. by ALL Coronavirus deaths =About 11K. 

U.S. HAS ROUGHLY 60K ADDITIONAL DEATHS IN PART BECAUSE TRUMP INITIALLY INFERRED THE VIRUS WAS A HOAX & therefore gov. (fed. & state) didn't treat it seriously for weeks. DISASTROUS
